mapper.insert: INSERT INTO genre(genreno, name, cnt, rdate) VALUES(genre_seq.nextval, #{name}, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT genreno, name, cnt, rdate, seqno, visible FROM genre ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT genreno, name, cnt, rdate, seqno, visible FROM genre WHERE visible='Y' ORDER BY seqno ASC
SELECT genreno, name, cnt, rdate FROM genre WHERE genreno=#{genreno}
mapper.update: UPDATE genre SET seqno = seqno - 1 WHERE genreno=#{genreno}
UPDATE genre SET seqno = seqno + 1 WHERE genreno=#{genreno}
UPDATE genre SET visible='Y' WHERE genreno=#{genreno}
UPDATE genre SET visible='N' WHERE genreno=#{genreno}
